tool_description: Stock Market Endpoint for Price Forecasts, Probability, Cash Flow Models , and Peer Comps
name: MarketCI Analytics
title: MarketCI Analytics

api_list.name: Price Forecasts
api_list.description: An AI-generated price forecast for the Stock over the next 3 months.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://marketci-analytics.p.rapidapi.com/Forecast/AAPL/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "marketci-analytics.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://marketci-analytics.p.rapidapi.com/Forecast/{symbol}/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "marketci-analytics.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Peers
Price Probability
api_list.description: Based on over 1000 forecasts, the probabilistic outcome is above or below the current price in a normal distribution.
api_list.code:

url = "https://marketci-analytics.p.rapidapi.com/Probabilities/AAPL"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "marketci-analytics.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
